beautyServices.title: Beauty Services
beautyServices.description: Transform your customers with a wide range of beauty services! From classic cuts to trendy styles, luxurious jewelry to glamorous makeup, every service helps you build your reputation as the best salon in town.

reviews.text: Absolutely adorable! My daughter loves styling hair and the customers are so cute. Perfect for creative minds!
So relaxing and fun! I love creating different looks and the jewelry options are beautiful.
Charming graphics and smooth gameplay. The variety of hairstyles keeps me entertained for hours!

updates.title: New Hairstyles Added!
updates.short: Discover 15 brand new trendy hairstyles with stunning accessories.
updates.full: We're excited to announce the release of 15 brand new hairstyles in Hair Salon: Beauty Salon! Each style introduces unique cutting techniques, new hair colors, and vibrant accessories that will test your styling skills like never before.

updates.title: Enhanced Beauty Tools
updates.short: Improved styling tools and faster service times.
updates.full: Thanks to valuable feedback from our amazing stylists, we've optimized Hair Salon: Beauty Salon to run even smoother across phones, tablets, and desktops. Enjoy lightning-fast styling and seamless hair animations!
